forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a gentle canopy of clouds, the air holding a hint of chill that whispers of the marine layer lingering just out of sight. The high for today hovers around sixty-three, but that warmth feels coy, retreating into the cool embrace of the afternoon, as if the sun shyly hides behind the veil of gray. Those who venture outside will find the light softened by the cloud cover, which weaves a moody tapestry across the skies. A light breeze stirs, almost playful, with gentle gusts from the southwest, offering a pleasant, invigorating touch.

As the day progresses, dressing in layers will be wise; a light sweater over a shirt, perhaps, warms the heart and keeps the chill at bay. With the marine layer spilling towards the city, the iconic landmarks appear as fleeting silhouettes against the backdrop of the fog, creating an ambiance that invites quiet exploration rather than grandiose adventures. A stroll along the Embarcadero or an amble through one of the charming neighborhoods beckons—both provide an opportunity to enjoy the beauty of the day with an undercurrent of serenity. In these cloud-kissed moments, the city reveals its subtle allure, a reminder that even in the cooler climes, joy can be found in the simplest experiences.
